In the previous part of this series, we introduced the Nesher Bari project, with the aim of building an ML classifier for vulture conservation. In this post, we dive into more technical details and explore one of the main datasets in the project: the Ornitela dataset.

entry.title: NLP analysis on SMS text - part II

link.title: NLP analysis on SMS text - part II

entry.summary:
In the first part of this Natural Language Processing (NLP) series, I pre-processed a SMS dataset using spaCy. In this post, I’ll use the Python library sklearn to extract some insights from the dataset.
Because we have a text-based dataset, we need to turn words into numerical objects to carry out our analysis. This leads us to the concept of vectorisation.
